text: Paper Moon is a 1973 American road comedy-drama movie directed by Peter Bogdanovich and was based on the 1971 novel Addie Pray by Joe David Brown. It stars Tatum O'Neal, Ryan O'Neal, Madeline Kahn, John Hillerman, Burton Gilliam, Randy Quaid and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It won an Academy Award and was nominated for 3 others in 1974. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 comedy-drama movies Category:1970s road movies Category:American road movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Peter Bogdanovich Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Black-and-white movies Category:Movies set in Kansas Category:Movies set in Missouri
title: Paper Moon (movie)
